name: Thrain
title: Dwarf Legend
description: A legendary dwarf from Stonehold's past. Got rich underground and wanted everyone to know it — wore so many gold rings in his beard that he clinked when he walked. Chin up, chest out, the kind of dwarf who becomes a story whether he tries to or not.
descriptiones: Un legendario enano del pasado de Stonehold. Se hizo rico bajo tierra y quería que todos lo supieran — llevaba tantos anillos de oro en la barba que tintineaba al caminar. Barbilla arriba, pecho fuera, el tipo de enano que se convierte en leyenda quiera o no.
